selected_quotes: Improvement in tibial component rotation for patient-specific instrumented total knee replacement
Patient Specific Instruments show less variance in tibial rotation-other studies suggest exact opposite !

citation.abstract: To compare the femoral and tibial components rotational alignment in total knee arthroplasty (TKA) performed either with conventional or with patient-specific instrumentation.
citation.title: Patient-specific instrumentation improves tibial component rotation in TKA.

author.name: Dr Toby Smith
author.description:
Lecturer - University of East Anglia. Interests: evidence on musculoskeletal disease in older people (views my own)

ORCID: http://orcid.org/0000-0003-1673…

author.name: Knee Clinic @OSSM
author.description: Dr Vertullo's Knee Surgery Clinic is an internationally recognised provider of advanced knee sportsmed reconstruction, restoration, replacement & resurfacing.
